title.romaji: Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu LOVE! LOVE!
title.english: Cute High Earth Defense Club LOVE! LOVE!

description:
The second season of Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu LOVE!

Teenage boys are notoriously lazy, and the members of Binan High School's Earth Defense Club are no exception. Their definition of “earth defense” is bumming around all day at the local bathhouse. But when a pink wombat appears out of thin air and begs the boys to help him save the planet, even the idlest high schoolers jump to action. Watch the magical boys transform and save the earth with the power of LOVE!

(Source: FUNimation)
synonyms: 美男高校地球防衛部LOVE！第2期
Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu LOVE! 2nd Season
Cute High Earth Defense Club Season 2

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

name.native: アラン・サルヴァトーレ

node.description: **Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._
**Hayato Numajiri** is a Japanese CG director.
Shinichi Nakamura is a producer working for Pony Canyon.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/magicmagico) He joined Okayasu Promotion after graduating and studied there as editor, he collected experience on tv animation and drama and gave his debut on Ninja Hattori. He is currently working for 1000 Yamakoshi. Not to be confused with the other Toshihiko Kojima whose name is written with different Kanji.
**Kaneda Kenichiro (兼田健一郎)** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.

Episode 2 - Love Means Never Feeling Regret

Episode 5 - To Steal Love Without Regret

Episode 7 - Love, Training Camp, and Toothbrushes
Episode 9 - Love is Stronger than Pride
